name: LucidAct Inc.
description: Developer of an enterprise platform intended to expedite healthcare management. The company's platform leverages artificial intelligence to offer chronic care management, insurance checklist automation, and remote patient tracking management, enabling healthcare professionals to manage more patients and facilitate their operations.
